variants.Description in input context: c.248G>A (p.G83D), causing a structural change affecting protein function.
c.251A>T (p.I84M) shows altered stability under stress conditions.

Material used.Description: Experiments were conducted using the HEK293 cell line, transfected with wild-type and mutant TP53 constructs.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression was reduced by 50% for the variant NM_001126112.3:c.248G>A, and showed increased degradation.
The variant NM_001126112.3:c.251A>T exhibited increased instability under oxidative stress conditions compared to wild-type TP53.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each condition.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA followed by a Tukey post-hoc test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression levels within 80-120% of baseline.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression levels below 80% or above 120% of baseline.
